title: Further experimental evidence pertaining to the applicability of the Ito and Stratonovic stochastic calculi to real physical systems.
abstract: We have used an analogue electronic simulator to study the effect of white noise upon a cubic bistable system. The experimental results are in excellent agreement with theoretical predictions based on the Stratonovic stochastic calculus
